title: This Is the Church Week 4 with Dr. Christina Edmondson
description:
On this week’s podcast episode, Raechel and Amanda dive deeper into the This Is the Church reading plan with educator, advocate, and speaker Dr. Christina Edmondson. How do we love one another well, even when we deeply disagree with each other? What does unity in the Church look like when we have doctrinal differences? Tune into a deep and rich conversation on how being rooted in Christ’s sacrificial love is foundational to living together in community. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 4 of the She Reads Truth This Is the Church reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the This Is the Church collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/this-is-the-church-week-4-with-dr-christina-edmondson.
